statements: SELECT * FROM gaming_accessories_pricing;
SELECT accessory_name, price FROM gaming_accessories_pricing;
SELECT price, accessory_name FROM gaming_accessories_pricing WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM gaming_accessories_pricing WHERE discount > 0;
SELECT accessory_name, discount, price FROM gaming_accessories_pricing ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM gaming_accessories_pricing WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT accessory_name, price, discount FROM gaming_accessories_pricing WHERE discount >= 0.1 AND price BETWEEN 30 AND 100;
SELECT id, accessory_name, price, discount FROM gaming_accessories_pricing ORDER BY discount ASC, price DESC;
SELECT accessory_name, price FROM gaming_accessories_pricing WHERE accessory_name LIKE 'Mouse%' OR accessory_name LIKE '%keyboard%';
SELECT id, accessory_name, price*(1-discount) AS discounted_price FROM gaming_accessories_pricing WHERE discount < 0.2 ORDER BY discounted_price ASC;
SELECT accessory_name, price FROM gaming_accessories
SELECT accessory_name, price, discount FROM gaming_accessories ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM gaming_accessories WHERE accessory_id = 1
SELECT accessory_name, category_name FROM gaming_accessories JOIN accessory_categories ON gaming_accessories.accessory_id = accessory_categories.accessory_id
SELECT accessory_name, price, discount FROM gaming_accessories WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price
SELECT * FROM gaming_accessories ORDER BY price DESC, accessory_name ASC, accessory_id
SELECT accessory_name, price, discount FROM gaming_accessories WHERE discount > 0.00 ORDER BY discount DESC, price ASC
SELECT accessory_name, price, category_name FROM gaming_accessories JOIN accessory_categories ON gaming_accessories.accessory_id = accessory_categories.accessory_id WHERE category_name = 'Headsets'
SELECT accessory_name, price, discount FROM gaming_accessories WHERE price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00 AND discount > 0.00 ORDER BY price ASC, discount DESC
SELECT accessory_name, price, discount FROM gaming_accessories WHERE accessory_name LIKE 'Mouse%' AND price < 50.00 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM gaming_accessories ORDER BY accessory_id DESC;
SELECT accessory_name, accessory_type, price FROM gaming_accessories WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY accessory_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM discount_codes WHERE active = TRUE ORDER BY discount_id;
SELECT code, discount_amount FROM discount_codes WHERE discount_amount > 0.5 AND discount_amount < 1.5;
SELECT accessory_name, quantity, location FROM gaming_accessories JOIN accessory_inventory ON gaming_accessories.accessory_id = accessory_inventory.accessory_id WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM gaming_accessories;
SELECT accessory_name, accessory_type, price FROM gaming_accessories WHERE accessory_type = 'Keyboard' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT a.accessory_name, a.price, i.quantity, i.location FROM gaming_accessories a JOIN accessory_inventory i ON a.accessory_id = i.accessory_id WHERE i.quantity > 0;
SELECT a.accessory_name, d.code, d.discount_amount, d.active FROM gaming_accessories a LEFT JOIN discount_codes d ON a.accessory_id = d.discount_id WHERE d.active = TRUE;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, MIN(price) AS min_price, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM gaming_accessories;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT id, name, price FROM accessories WHERE category = 'Clothing';
SELECT name, price, category FROM accessories ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, discount FROM accessories WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY discount ASC;
SELECT p.name, c.name AS category FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.id;
SELECT * FROM accessories;
SELECT name, category, price FROM accessories WHERE price > 50;
SELECT category, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM accessories GROUP BY category;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, c.name AS category_name, d.discount_rate FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.id JOIN discounts d ON p.id = d.product_id;
SELECT * FROM discounts WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' AND end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM accessories;
SELECT id, name, price FROM accessories WHERE discount_percent > 0;
SELECT id, name, price, discount_percent FROM accessories ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM accessories WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT id, name, price, discount_percent FROM accessories WHERE name LIKE 'Head%';
SELECT * FROM accessories;
SELECT name, price FROM accessories ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT ac.name, c.name AS category FROM accessories ac JOIN accessory_categories acat ON ac.id = acat.accessory_id JOIN categories c ON acat.category_id = c.id;
SELECT c.name AS category, AVG(a.price) AS avg_price FROM accessories a JOIN accessory_categories ac ON a.id = ac.accessory_id JOIN categories c ON ac.category_id = c.id GROUP BY c.name;
SELECT o.id AS order_id, c.name AS customer_name, o.total_amount FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;
